author: mrglavas
msg: Performance: Replacing Vectors with unsynchronized ArrayLists and HashTables with unsynchronized HashMaps. Should give a small boost to IDC processing.

author: kaosko
msg: Complete - issue SHIRO-110: Remove org.apache.shiro.mgt.SubjectBinder and its usages

- removed SubjectBinder and SecurityManager.getSubject. Added two TODO comments as a hint to consider refactoring the functionality to Subject.Binder as part of a separate issue. Needs some discussion first.
- Changed SecurityUtils.getSubject() implementation to use Subject.Builder if subject wasn't available in ThreadContext
